definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To hit in the face with a pie, either for comic effect or as a means of protest (see also pieing ).
examples: I'd like to see someone pie the chairman of the board.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To go around (a corner) in a guarded manner.
( transitive , UK , slang , often followed by off ) To ignore (someone).

main_definition: ( transitive ) To hit in the face with a pie, either for comic effect or as a means of protest (see also pieing ).
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To go around (a corner) in a guarded manner.
( transitive , UK , slang , often followed by off ) To ignore (someone).

definitions.definition: Alternative form of pi ( “ to spill or mix printing type ” ) .

main_definition: ( transitive ) Alternative form of pi ( “ to spill or mix printing type ” ) .
